text: Ammavarikuppam is a census town in Thiruvallur district in the state of Tamil Nadu, India. ==Demographics== India census, Ammaiyarkuppam had a population of 15234. Males constitute 62% of the population and females 38%. Ammaiyarkuppam has an average literacy rate of 76%, higher than the national average of 59.5%; with 61% of the males and 39% of females literate. 14% of the population is under 6 years of age. == Schools == # T.M.K.V.Boys.Govt.Hr.Sec.School # Mangalangizhar Girls Hr.Sec.School # Primary School # A.N.M. Middle School == Financial Institutions == # Indian Bank ==References== Category:Cities and towns in Tiruvallur district
title: Ammavarikuppam
